#summary MySQL tables

= MySQL Tables =

{{{

use goesmtp;

--
-- TABLES
--

--
-- Table structure for table `DHT`
--

CREATE TABLE `DHT` (
  `id` bigint(20) NOT NULL,
  `sha1` varchar(40) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL,
  `mailbox` text CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL,
  `cached` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `size` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `orignodeid` int(11) NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`sha1`),
  UNIQUE KEY `id` (`id`),
  FULLTEXT KEY `mailbox` (`mailbox`)
) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

--
-- Table structure for table `newMessageLog`
--

CREATE TABLE `newMessageLog` (
  `id` bigint(20) NOT NULL,
  `sha1` varchar(40) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL,
  `mailbox` text NOT NULL,
  `size` int(11) NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`sha1`),
  UNIQUE KEY `id` (`id`),
  FULLTEXT KEY `mailbox` (`mailbox`)
) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;
}}}
